name: Diamond Skeeball
description:
Diamond Skee-Ball is an arcade game and one of the first redemption games.

It is played by rolling a ball up an inclined lane and over a "ball-hop" hump (resembling a ski jump) that jumps the ball into bullseye rings.

The object of the game is to collect as many points as possible by having the ball fall into holes in the rings which have progressively increasing point values.

Diamond Skeeball Is a chat intergrated game for streamer to play with there community.


Features of the game:

1) Custom Ball Skins
2) Different Game Modes
3) Custom Overlays

We are activly devleoping Diamond Skee-Ball with new features on each update we bring to the game to keep the fun in the game without you going out and spending real money for each roll you do in the game.
